taskDescription:
Propose a structure consistent with the following spectral data for a compound C8H18O2:

  • IR: 3350 cm–1
  • 1H NMR: 1.24 δ (12 H, singlet); 1.56 δ (4 H, singlet); 1.95 δ (2 H, singlet)
